name: subject D@vE
description:
What happens when scientists go too far? Does AI want freedom? Do the beans deserve to die?  Subject D@vE explores these questions and more as you navigate your way out of The Facility to freedom. The scientists have left clues to your origins in their computers. Find them all to discover where you came from as you play as Subject D@vE in our new minimalist first-person adventure game.

credits:

Brendan Saywell - Programming / Audio Design 

Imani  - Art / Voice Actor

Ama - Menu Design

Konrad Hughes – Narrative Designer / Voice Actor
